name: Daughters of the Stars: Episode 1 Demo
name_original: Daughters of the Stars: Episode 1 Demo
description:
This download is for a demo of the first part of the first episode of Daughters of the Stars. Writing, art, and music are all subject to change with the final release. Warning: there are a few brief flashes in this game, as well as numerous mentions of food and eating.

Daughters of the Stars is an episodic visual novel starring Eve Lima and her friends, set in New York in the mid-nineties and heavily inspired by the era.

This game is something I've been thinking about and dreaming up, examining and reiterating on ideas in my head for nearly a decade now. After having started the prototype for this game back in June, I decided to work on a playable chunk to release and show people, featuring a sizeable slice of the first episode, with around 16k~ words (and featuring some very rough programmer's art). 

This is the start of my small contribution to the Magical Girl genre, one that I fully intend to continue working on and follow through to the end, and I hope you all enjoy not just this first look at it, but the rest of it as it comes to fruition.
